short_summary: **Contract ID:** WS3728465376  **Type:** Tender  **Department:** Public Works and Government Services  **Procurement Category:** Goods  **Short Summary:** The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), Research Center, Saskatoon Saskatchewan has a requirement for the supply, installation and delivery of one (1) controlled environment Plant Growth Chamber for the Plant Gene Resource of Canada (PGRC) located in located in Saskatoon, SK
description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), Research Center, Saskatoon Saskatchewan has a requirement for the supply, installation and delivery of one (1) controlled environment Plant Growth Chamber for the Plant Gene Resource of Canada (PGRC) located in located in Saskatoon, SK in accordance with the specifications identified herein.
